summary: The implementation successfully addresses all 7 requirements. VM status management is fully implemented with backend storage, admin controls, and client display. The chat system includes backend data structures, client floating widget, and admin management interface. Admin profile display is present in the header. All acceptance criteria appear to be met based on the diff evidence.

hallucinated_features.description: Migration module (backend/migration.mo) for upgrading existing actor state
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not mention data migration or upgrading existing deployments. This appears to be infrastructure code added beyond the specified requirements.
